Guardia and Ravenchief were startled by the sound of combat on the
other side of the rooem.

"How the...." Ravenchief asked hurrying to the other, hovering a few
feet off the ground.

"Hostiles, hostiles!  Engaging the enemy." she screamed into the
radio, then chasing after Ravenchief and the maximal trooper following
behind him.

On 12/14/09, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> It was as Tucson suspected, the only bot who could sense and detect
> Nightstrike was indeed him and possibly Tallon.  Neither Guardia or
> Ravenchief could detect Nightstrike for some odd reason, but he was as real
> as any physical body.
>
> "Apparently our enemy has the ability to cloak even his energy signature.
> If it weren't for my sonar equipment, I don't think I would have picked up
> on him either."
>
> He bursts into a speedy advance on his wheels, makes it into the next room,
> and transforms again into robot mode, skidding on the floor, while doing so.
>  He makes it into the next room where Nightstrike had gone into.  By using
> sonar equipment, he scans the the room, picks up a strong ping, and again
> locks onto his foe.
>
> " Come on, I Thought you'd make this a lot harder for me! I barely even got
> scratched!"
>
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
>>
>> Perseus take a look at the incoming data, then motions to Salveo to look.
>>
>> "It appears like someone may have made their home there after our
>> friends left." he said to Perseus.
>>
>> "Perseus to team, leave the CR chamber for later, our top priority is
>> to secure the base.  Let us know when you find out more."
>>
>> "Roger" Guardia said into the radio, while watching Ravenchief play
>> with the control systems.
>>
>> "It looks like main power is deactivated.  According to the logs, the
>> reactors were shut down manually, but are undamaged." he reported
>> after a moment.
>>
>> "Security system?" she asked.
>>
>> "Totally destroyed.  Someone wasnt happy about being watched."
>>
>> "Jhaxius.... but he's with Hydras now right?"
>>
>> "Then who's is Tuscon picking up?" Ravenchief asked, both of them
>> turning to look at the blind bot.
>>
>> On 12/5/09, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wrote:
>> > Tucson couldn't help but keep an air of apprehension in his movements,
>> > yet

>> > CR
>> > chamber.  He steps away still with a defensive stance.
>> >
>> > " Thanks for the update, guys.  But something tells me that there could
>> > be
>> > someone else here besides the Maximal in the CR Chamber.  I pickedup on
>> > another voice in this vicinity, and I don't think it's friendly."
>> >

>> > it.
>> > Sure enough, he gets two pings instead of one.
>> >
>> > " I knew it.  All right, fun's over!  You called me pathetic and now you
>> > lay
>> > in hiding somewhere in this vicinity!  I'm not tolerating your charades
>> > and
>> > there's no way in the name of Primus I'm going to let you harm my

>> > down

>> > yet.  In fact, I might have been the only one to hear him..  I'm sending
